data.oai_dc:dc:
Aproximately 30% of records in JBAG-Laínz are provided. 31 records correspond to type specimens, among which 14 are the holotypes of taxa described by M. Laínz. Georeference information corresponding to taxa mentioned in Fernández Prieto, J.A., Díaz González, T. &, Nava, H.S. (2007) La Protección de la flora vascular del Principado de Asturias. Naturalia Cantabricae 3: 37-56, had been denatured to 0.01 degrees. If more accurate precision the data is required, please contact to: J. Ignacio Alonso Felpete (alonsojose@,uniovi.es).

Note: this dataset was previously orphaned. It has been rescued by ① extracting it from the GBIF.org index (see GBIF Download in External Data) and ② republishing it on this IPT data hosting centre as version 1.0.

|14,411 occurrences
